Sentencas: Renewable energy (RE) is regarded as the main part of the primary energy in the forthcoming energy internet.
Titulo: Mutual information for evaluating renewable power penetration impacts in a distributed generation system

Sentencas: However, the intermittence and variability of renewable energy limit its present penetration.
Titulo: Mutual information for evaluating renewable power penetration impacts in a distributed generation system

Sentencas: To study the effect of the renewable energy penetration on power supply and demand, a dynamic distributed multi-energy generation system combining RE, natural gas (NG) and energy storage was built based on the semi-physical model library.
Titulo: Mutual information for evaluating renewable power penetration impacts in a distributed generation system

Sentencas: The model library consisted of four key links of a distributed generation system: a generation link, storage link, recycle link and user-load link.
Titulo: Mutual information for evaluating renewable power penetration impacts in a distributed generation system

Sentencas: Simulation indicated that the responses of a reversible solid oxide fuel cell (RSOC) and Li-ion battery were faster than that of a gas internal combustion engine (GICE).
Titulo: Mutual information for evaluating renewable power penetration impacts in a distributed generation system

Sentencas: Furthermore, a novel indicator based on the mutual information was applied in a distributed generation system coupling RE, NG and energy storage.
Titulo: Mutual information for evaluating renewable power penetration impacts in a distributed generation system

Sentencas: The results showed that the indicator was applicable for evaluating power balance degree and device capacity selection.
Titulo: Mutual information for evaluating renewable power penetration impacts in a distributed generation system

Sentencas: Based on the indicator, it was found that the power balance degree decreased with increasing wind power penetration.
Titulo: Mutual information for evaluating renewable power penetration impacts in a distributed generation system

Sentencas: Co-storage of RSOC and Li-ion was found to effectively alleviate the power unbalance caused by wind power and save the energy storage capacity in the meantime.
Titulo: Mutual information for evaluating renewable power penetration impacts in a distributed generation system
